author: Carey Jones
description: Stirred down and boozy so suited to late night sipping. This cocktail has broader appeal when served on-the-rocks in an old-fashioned glass, either way it is cigar-like and suits being accompanied by one.
name: 100 Year Old Cigar
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with absinthe and set to one side
STIR other ingredients with ice and fine strain into pre-prepared glass
